channel.title: Some items are worn weirdly
channel.description:
Turns out that this happens whenever I add the 602 NPCs..for some reason..
Here is a picture: [IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/8070/28638833.png[/img]
Another picture that shows my problem: [IMG]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/1757/76712266.png[/img]
And another picture...
[IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/2888/76172650.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/8431/99350984.png[/img]
P.S I tried adding the new characters..but it didn't fix the problem..some items are still worn in a weird way..
